text: Sound of the Desert () is a 1932 Polish adventure romantic comedy movie directed by Michał Waszyński and starring Nora Ney, Eugeniusz Bodo, Maria Bogda, Adam Brodzisz. == Other websites == * Category:1930s adventure movies Category:1930s romantic comedy movies Category:1932 romance movies Category:1932 comedy movies Category:Polish adventure movies Category:Polish romance movies Category:Polish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michał Waszyński
title: Sound of the Desert
